hints.label: pred-adaptive-gas-confinement
hints.title: Adaptive Gas Exhibits Confinement
hints.content:
5504: :label: pred-adaptive-gas-confinement
5505: 
5506: **Source:** [13_E_cst_ig_lattice_qft.md § 11.1, lines 1549-1577]
5507: 
5508: **Hypothesis:** The Adaptive Gas in multi-modal fitness landscapes exhibits **confinement-like behavior**, analogous to quark confinement in QCD.
5509: 
5510: **Observable:** Measure Wilson loops on CST+IG for different loop sizes $R$:
5511: 
5512: $$
5513: \langle W[R] \rangle \sim e^{-\sigma R^2}
5514: 
5515: $$
5516: 
5517: (area law with string tension $\sigma > 0$).
5518: 
5519: **Physical interpretation:** Walkers trapped in fitness basins are analogous to confined quarks—attempting to separate them costs energy $\propto$ distance (fitness penalty).
5520: 
5521: **Prediction:** String tension related to **barrier height**:
5522: 
5523: $$
5524: \sigma \sim \frac{\Delta \Phi_{\text{fit}}}{\delta^2}
5525: 
5526: $$
5527: 
5528: where $\Delta \Phi_{\text{fit}}$ is barrier height and $\delta$ is cloning noise scale.
5529: 
5530: **Experimental test:**
5531: 1. Design fitness landscape with known barrier heights
5532: 2. Run Adaptive Gas, construct CST+IG
hints.raw_directive:
5501: ### 11.1. Confinement in Fitness Landscapes
5502: 
5503: :::{prf:prediction} Adaptive Gas Exhibits Confinement
5504: :label: pred-adaptive-gas-confinement
5505: 
5506: **Source:** [13_E_cst_ig_lattice_qft.md § 11.1, lines 1549-1577]
5507: 
5508: **Hypothesis:** The Adaptive Gas in multi-modal fitness landscapes exhibits **confinement-like behavior**, analogous to quark confinement in QCD.
5509: 
5510: **Observable:** Measure Wilson loops on CST+IG for different loop sizes $R$:
5511: 
5512: $$
5513: \langle W[R] \rangle \sim e^{-\sigma R^2}
5514: 
5515: $$
5516: 
5517: (area law with string tension $\sigma > 0$).
5518: 
5519: **Physical interpretation:** Walkers trapped in fitness basins are analogous to confined quarks—attempting to separate them costs energy $\propto$ distance (fitness penalty).
5520: 
5521: **Prediction:** String tension related to **barrier height**:
5522: 
5523: $$
5524: \sigma \sim \frac{\Delta \Phi_{\text{fit}}}{\delta^2}
5525: 
5526: $$
5527: 
5528: where $\Delta \Phi_{\text{fit}}$ is barrier height and $\delta$ is cloning noise scale.
5529: 
5530: **Experimental test:**
5531: 1. Design fitness landscape with known barrier heights
5532: 2. Run Adaptive Gas, construct CST+IG
5533: 3. Measure $\sigma$ from Wilson loop scaling

hints.label: pred-confinement-deconfinement-transition
hints.title: Confinement-Deconfinement Transition
hints.content:
5540: :label: pred-confinement-deconfinement-transition
5541: 
5542: **Source:** [13_E_cst_ig_lattice_qft.md § 11.2, lines 1581-1602]
5543: 
5544: **Hypothesis:** As algorithmic parameters vary (cloning noise $\delta$, selection pressure $T$), the CST+IG lattice undergoes **phase transition** from confined to deconfined phase.
5545: 
5546: **Order parameter:** String tension $\sigma(\delta, T)$
5547: 
5548: **Phase diagram:**
5549: 
5550: | **Phase** | **Parameters** | **$\sigma$** | **Physics** |
5551: |-----------|----------------|--------------|-------------|
5552: | **Confined** | Small $\delta$, low $T$ | $\sigma > 0$ | Walkers trapped, area law |
5553: | **Deconfined** | Large $\delta$, high $T$ | $\sigma = 0$ | Walkers free, perimeter law |
5554: | **Critical point** | $\delta_c(T)$ | $\sigma \to 0^+$ | Phase transition |
hints.raw_directive:
5537: ### 11.2. Phase Transitions in Parameter Space
5538: 
5539: :::{prf:prediction} Confinement-Deconfinement Transition
5540: :label: pred-confinement-deconfinement-transition
5541: 
5542: **Source:** [13_E_cst_ig_lattice_qft.md § 11.2, lines 1581-1602]
5543: 
5544: **Hypothesis:** As algorithmic parameters vary (cloning noise $\delta$, selection pressure $T$), the CST+IG lattice undergoes **phase transition** from confined to deconfined phase.
5545: 
5546: **Order parameter:** String tension $\sigma(\delta, T)$
5547: 
5548: **Phase diagram:**
5549: 
5550: | **Phase** | **Parameters** | **$\sigma$** | **Physics** |
5551: |-----------|----------------|--------------|-------------|
5552: | **Confined** | Small $\delta$, low $T$ | $\sigma > 0$ | Walkers trapped, area law |
5553: | **Deconfined** | Large $\delta$, high $T$ | $\sigma = 0$ | Walkers free, perimeter law |
5554: | **Critical point** | $\delta_c(T)$ | $\sigma \to 0^+$ | Phase transition |
5555:
